reviews.review_msg: I feel bad saying this cause she seems really nice but as far as online courses go, this has been my worst experience thus far it might as well be me trying to teach my self the course. Its exclusively long and monotonous power points, hardly any teacher guidance outside the odd video. Have fun sifting through 60+ slide power points 3 times a week.

Flora is a really nice teacher with a positive personality as apposed to all the other grumpy and generally strict teachers. She teaches well and takes her time to make you understand. She grades really fairly as well, doesn't make you feel bad for making a minor mistake. Would take her again. Makes you enjoy learning.

I honestly felt bad for her most of the time, as she can't control the class, she allows them to walk all over them. First class she arrived 30min late and when she teaches it makes no sense until you go home and teach yourself from the book. The lectures themselves are slides which hurt eyes after a while and her explaining is awful. She isnicetho
